text: Hatfield Peverel is a village and civil parish in Braintree, Essex, England. In 2001 there were 4,384 people living in Hatfield Peverel. == Transport == === Road === The B1137 and B1019 roads pass through the village. The A12 road bypasses the village. === Rail === Hatfield Peverel has a station. == References == Category:Villages in Essex Category:Civil parishes in Essex
title: Hatfield Peverel
